textBox.richText: While we were up at Alta, WP finally opened Belle, and had the Cirque open for directed Skiing. Max had comp#2 on saturday, but he and mom went back that night...so I had a full day of “wear Glenn out”. :) They were supposed to get dumped on, but turns out they only got a couple inches. Still, the trees were pretty good. Belle was rocky up at the top, and the powder chute was a minefield (yes, had to fix one core shot...) The trees were great though...could find stashes of deep pow. They also opened up the far-side of the cliff on Black Coal, giving access to Left Hand. Good stuff in there. No vids, but graphs below:
